message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.

I think a 51/49 split is a more fair starting point. It takes into account the inflation that will affect your side more. Let's start from here and see if we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your attempt to factor in the inflation. However, the initial split needs to be more balanced. I propose a 52/48 split. This recognizes the time pressure while still offering you a significant sum.
